name: Introduction to Biology
description: This course will introduce students to the basics of biology, covering topics such as cell structure, genetics, and evolution.

name: Organic Chemistry
description: This course covers the structure, nomenclature, and properties of organic compounds.

name: Cell Biology
description: This course covers the structure and function of cells and their organelles.

name: Genetics
description: This course covers the principles of heredity and the molecular basis of gene expression.

name: Evolution
description: This course covers the theory of evolution and its applications to the study of biology.

name: Botany
description: This course covers the study of plants, including their structure, growth, reproduction, and classification.
